name: Z Protocol
description: Yield farming has become a popular concept in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space, offering investors an opportunity to earn passive income by lending or staking their digital assets. Z Protocol offers a set of tools essential to a growing decentralized ecosystem. Our goal is to create a synergy between the projects that are currently developing on Scroll. We offer swap function (DEX), Farming, Staking (NFT Staking soon), Lock Vault and future launchpad services for small scale projects.
